title: 1999/251/EC: Commission Decision of 23 March 1999 amending the list of less-favoured areas within the meaning of Regulation (EC) No 950/97 (Ireland) (notified under document number C(1999) 709)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 23 March 1999
amending the list of less-favoured areas within the meaning of Regulation (EC) No 950/97 (Ireland)
(notified under document number C(1999) 709)
(Only the English text is authentic)
(1999/251/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The list of less-favoured areas in Ireland contained in the Annex to Directive 85/350/EEC, Directive 91/466/EEC(4) and Directive 96/52/EC(5) is supplemented by the lists in the Annex to this Decision.
The list of less-favoured areas reclassified as more severely handicapped concerning County Monaghan is replaced by the list communicated by the Irish Government by letter of 30 April 1997.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 March 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
